page.title: 07FARMING
page.content:
Vincent's Egg Farm and the North-east Cheshire Drag Hunt.
On Tuesday my friends and I went to look at some places near Woodseats. The places which were most interesting were the Egg Farm and the North-east Cheshire Drag Hunt. First we went to the place where the puppies were kept. The hound puppies were gorgeous. We couldn't go in because it said Private on the gate and there was a big bitch prowling around. Then all the little puppies came running over, chewing and licking our fingers. We carried on down to the egg farm where we saw a load of eggs all piled in cages ready to be sent away.
